behavior use_remote_control(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote) 
        # Temporarily hold the remote control in hand

        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Ensure the DVD player is turned on using the remote control
        
        achieve_once not inhand(remote)
        # Release the remote control after use
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and id[remote]==2052
        # Select the remote control with the specific ID

        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player]==2061
        # Select the DVD player with the specific ID

        use_remote_control(remote, dvd_player)
        # Use the remote control to turn on the DVD player

behavior achieve_use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        # Ensure close proximity to the remote before using it
        achieve close(remote, dvd_player)
        # Ensure the remote is close to the DVD player to operate it
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Turn the DVD player on using the remote

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and id[remote]==2052
        # Select the specific remote control with ID 2052

        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player]==2061
        # Select the specific DVD player with ID 2061

        achieve_use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote, dvd_player)
        # Perform the behavior to turn on the DVD player with the remote

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        # Achieve the state where the DVD player is on
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        # Bind the specific instances of the remote control and the DVD player
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control] == 2052
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player] == 2061
        # Use the behavior to turn on the DVD player
        turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(remote_control, dvd_player)
